roleset.name: to refuse allegiance to
roleset.note: REBEL-V NOTES: VN class conspire-71. (from rebel.01-v)
REBELLION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, rebel.01. Corresponds to VNcls conspire-71. (from rebellion.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Until recently , Adobe had a lock on the market for image software , but last month Apple , Adobe 's biggest customer , and Microsoft rebelled .
example.arg: Apple , Adobe 's biggest customer , and Microsoft

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Following in the footsteps of Satan himself, they will carry their rebellion against God to the bitter end.

example.name: all args
example.text: As is the case with Lincoln's economic rebellion against his father ...
